The judge noted that 'fraud' is a derogatory term. The court reserved its judgment on Dabur's plea.

The 50-share NSE Nifty dipped by 87.95 points or 0.34 per cent to 25,509.70.

items.title: Bernstein says India could benefit if US recession hits

items.title: Bernstein stays cautious on India exposure, prefers low volatility, large-caps
